item.title: What Happened to Windows Update?
item.description: Recently, my wife mentioned she was seeing some warning on her computer that it was almost out of disk space. I thought this odd as her system has a 500GB SSD, and last I checked it still had over 400GB free. To play it safe, I took a quick look at her system and found it had a new (and unknown) drive labeled D: with just under 50MB available. This was the drive causing the Low Disk Space warning.
